property.label: Login Button Label
property.name: loginButtonLoginMessage
property.description: Text used on the login button

property.label: Login Waiting Button Label
property.name: loginButtonWaitingMessage
property.description: Text used on the login button after clicking

property.label: Redirect URL After Login
property.name: portalLoginRedirect
property.description: Set the URL that the user will be redirected to once they successfully login

property.label: Blocked User Error
property.name: blockUserErrorMessage
property.description: Error message shown if the user has been temporarily blocked by the Salesforce Administrator.
property.default: Your account has been temporarily disabled. Please contact us for assistance.

property.label: Incorrect Username/Password Error
property.name: incorrectUserCredentialsErrorMessage
property.description: Error message shown if the user has provided incorrect login details.
property.default: The username or password you entered was not recognised. Please check and try again.

property.label: User Locked Out Error
property.name: userLockedOutErrorMessage
property.description: Error message shown if the user has entered their credentials incorrectly too many times in quick succession and they are not temporarily locked out.
property.default: Your account has been temporarily locked. Please try again later.

property.label: Enable Passwordless Login?
property.name: enablePasswordlessLogin
property.description: Allow the user to login with a previously verified email address or phone number

property.label: Submit Verification Code Button Label
property.name: loginButtonAwaitingCodeMessage
property.description: Button label when the component is awaiting a verification code input from the user to login.

property.label: Verification Code Validation Error
property.name: failedCodeVerificationMessage
property.description: Error message shown if there is a problem verifying the specified verification code entered by the user.
property.default: There was a problem verifying the code provided. Please check and try again.

property.label: Verification Code Send Error
property.name: portalErrorSendVerificationCode
property.description: Error message shown if there is a problem sending a verification code to the user based on the method chosen.
property.default: There was a problem sending a verification code. Please try again later or contact us for further assistance.
